backend/main.mo: Motoko backend actor managing chatrooms, messages, reactions, user profiles, and access control with admin-gated operations and in-memory ordered maps.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing feature IDs, affected files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and behavior of various frontend source files.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file bootstrapping the frontend app and loading the main React entrypoint.
frontend/src/App.tsx: App-level router and layout setup with lobby, chatroom, and admin routes plus error boundaries and theming.
frontend/src/components/AvatarPickerDial: Dialog for selecting, uploading, searching, and removing user avatars with Giphy integration and debounced search.
frontend/src/components/ChatArea.tsx: Main chat UI handling message display, sending, replies, auto-scroll, pinned video, and collapsible header behavior.
frontend/src/components/ChatroomCard.tsx: Displays a chatroom card with media thumbnails, live status, and fetched previews for YouTube, Twitch, and Twitter content.
frontend/src/components/CreateChatroomDi: Modal dialog for creating chatrooms with topic, media upload, YouTube/Twitch URL validation, and Twitter embed preview.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer showing attribution and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header bar with navigation, username editing, and avatar selection.
frontend/src/components/LoginPrompt.tsx: No-op placeholder component rendering nothing as authentication is not used.
frontend/src/components/MessageBubble.ts: Renders individual chat messages with reactions, media embeds, replies, pins, and Twitter widgets.
frontend/src/components/MessageInput.tsx: Input box for sending messages with optional image upload, YouTube/Twitch/Twitter URLs, and voice recording.
frontend/src/components/PinnedVideo.tsx: Displays a pinned YouTube or Twitch video with an option to unpin.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Empty or placeholder file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/VoiceMessagePlay: React audio player with waveform visualization, playback controls, and synchronized state resets tied to audioUrl changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebouncedValue.ts: Returns a debounced version of a value after a delay using a timeout.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, handling login, stored identity loading, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React-query hooks for chatrooms, messages, and reactions, with actor integration and transient-result guards.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup with theme variables, dark mode, mobile input fixes, and custom voice message slider styles.
frontend/src/lib/formatters.ts: Formats numbers into compact notation like k, M, and B.
frontend/src/lib/giphy.ts: Functions for searching and fetching trending GIFs from Giphy with error handling.
frontend/src/lib/twitterOEmbedPreview.ts: Fetches and parses Twitter oEmbed data with caching, deduped requests, and lightweight HTML extraction for text and images.
frontend/src/lib/twitterOEmbedPreviewCac: Implements localStorage caching for Twitter previews with versioning, validation, expiration, and key generation.
frontend/src/lib/twitterThumbnail.ts: Empty placeholder file for Twitter thumbnail logic.
frontend/src/lib/twitterThumbnailCache.t: Empty placeholder file for Twitter thumbnail caching.
frontend/src/lib/videoUtils.ts: Provides utilities for extracting IDs from YouTube, Twitch, and Twitter URLs and generating associated thumbnail or embed URLs.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider, rendering the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDeleteChatroomsP: Admin page requiring a password to list and delete chatrooms, using session-based auth and query hooks.
frontend/src/pages/ChatroomPage.tsx: Loads a chatroom by ID, increments view count, handles errors, and renders ChatArea once data is ready.
frontend/src/pages/LobbyPage.tsx: Displays chatroom listings with search, category filters, creation dialog, and navigation to chatrooms.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS config defining theme extensions, OKLCH-based color system, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Project state describing a chatroom app and a bug where chatroom lists vanish after creation due to transient empty fetch responses.
